transArray.content: I went to work around the hotel and stayed for one night. The hotel is in a good location. It's right on the roadside and is easy to find. The parking yard is large and parking is free. The room is very clean. The staff's attitude is also good and the service is very attentive. There are snacks at the front desk, you can eat fruit for free, and the takeout robot will deliver your order to the room. Technology changes life. I will recommend it to my friends and those in need.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. As a comfortable brand of Huazhu, Orange brand attaches great importance to the stay experience of all guests. We are extremely honored that you can enjoy your stay! The hotel is being disinfected and cleaned every day, and the hotel has also strengthened its intelligent "contactless" service. During your stay, items required will be delivered to the room by a robot, ensuring that the robot will be disinfected again after each use, ensuring your travel safety. Escorting and protecting the "peace of mind" and "safety" of every guest is our consistent and important mission! Looking forward to your next stay! Thanks! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
